Posts.Content: I am sure you've been told that you're considered high risk. I strongly urge you to seek genetics counseling and ask about genetic testing for hereditary breast and ovarian cancer.
Posts.Signature: BRCA 2+ Prophylactic Bilateral Mastectomies- 5/07, "One Stage Reconstruction" with Drs. Salzberg and Ashikari Prophylactic Hysterectomy, 3/13 DaVinci robotic procedure www.previvors.com
Posts.Title: Both parents - breast cancer
